name: strava-weather
description: Automatically add weather data to Strava activities using webhooks

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w api" "npm run dev -w web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w api && npm run build -w web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w api && npm run lint -w web
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w api && npm run lint:fix -w web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w api && npm run typecheck -w web
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules api/node_modules web/node_modules api/dist web/dist

author: Your Name
